articles.title: EU is 'abusing its powers' says Hungary after court rules bloc can halt funds to rule-breaking nations - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Hungary slammed the ruling by the European Courts of Justice calling it a "political judgement"
articles.content: The European Union's highest court ruled on Wednesday that the 27-nation bloc can suspend support payments to member states if they breach rule of law principles, and dismissed a challenge by Hungary… [+3784 chars]

articles.author: Ryan O'Hanlon
articles.title: Predicting the Champions League winners: Why Man City, Real Madrid, PSG will not lift the trophy - ESPN
articles.description: The best team in Europe rarely win the UEFA Champions League, which is part of what makes the competition so special. Looking through the statistical profiles of past winners, who stands the best chance in 2022?
articles.content: Want to cook up a get-rich-quick scheme? Figure out who wins the UEFA Champions League. Although the tournament purports to crown the champions of Europe, the best team in Europe usually don't win it… [+18730 chars]
